__e: He seems to think some of us are infected with a new strain.
Then 19 days ago he accidentally gets infected by his own virus, but now you can't shut it down.
I could be infected with God knows what, okay?
Any one of us could be infected, and not even know it.
Whatever it is, he's got it and he's convinced that he can save himself if he knows what it is.
Looking down, you couldn't tell which faces were infected and which weren't.
He might have been infected by something he ate or drank, even something he touched.
This place is pretty pig-infested but otherwise, it's a great place to work.
It's like I'm infected with him or something.
